sentences.en: Both are blessed with uncommon ability to fix things.
sentences.cn: 两人在修理东西上都有一手绝活。

sentences.en: Ellis was able to quickly find and fix the problem.
sentences.cn: 埃利斯马上就找到并解决了问题。

sentences.en: fixed me up with an escort at the last minute.
sentences.cn: 最后给我找了个同伴

sentences.en: Have you fixed a date for the wedding yet?
sentences.cn: 你确定婚礼的日期了吗？

sentences.en: He cannot fix the electricity.
sentences.cn: 他不会修电路。

sentences.en: He had not been able to fix his position.
sentences.cn: 他一直未能确定他所在的位置。

sentences.en: He's going to fix a time when I can see him.
sentences.cn: 他将确定一个我可以见他的时间。

sentences.en: He’s outside fixing the brakes on the car.
sentences.cn: 他在外面修理汽车的刹车。

sentences.en: I believe in the maxim "if it ain't broke, don't fix it".
sentences.cn: 我相信这样一条箴言：“不破不修”。

sentences.en: I need my fix of sugar, sweets, and chocolate.
sentences.cn: 我离不开糖、甜品和巧克力。

sentences.en: I wrote back to Meudon at once to fix up a meeting.
sentences.cn: 我马上给缪顿回信安排会面。

sentences.en: It's been hard to get a steady fix on what's going on.
sentences.cn: 要对正在发生的事情保持持续的关注和了解并不容易。

sentences.en: Many of those changes could just be a temporary fix.
sentences.cn: 那些变革中可能有很多只是权宜之计。

sentences.en: My attempt to fix it sent Lawrence into fits of laughter.
sentences.cn: 我试着修理它，却让劳伦斯乐得前仰后合。

sentences.en: Scotty stayed behind to fix lunch.
sentences.cn: 斯科蒂留下来做午饭。

sentences.en: That'll fix him.
sentences.cn: 那样他就不会再干了。

sentences.en: The interest rate has been fixed at 6.5%.
sentences.cn: 利率已经定为6.5%。

sentences.en: The shelves should be fixed to the wall with screws.
sentences.cn: 架子应当用螺丝固定在墙上。

sentences.en: The trouble with her is she needs her daily fix of publicity.
sentences.cn: 她的问题在于她每天都想要在媒体上曝一曝光。

sentences.en: They thought that their relatives would be able to fix the visas.
sentences.cn: 他们以为他们的亲戚们会把签证办好。

sentences.en: This will put us in a very difficult economic fix.
sentences.cn: 这将让我们陷入非常困难的经济窘境。

sentences.en: We didn't"fix" anything. It'll be seen as it happens.
sentences.cn: 我们没做任何手脚，该什么样就会什么样。

words.tran_cn: 固定的；定色的；防挥发的
固执的；<美口>处境...的；准备好的；确定的
固定剂；[助剂] 定色剂；定影剂
固定器；[摄] 定影剂；毒贩子；调停者
设备；固定装置；固定于某处不大可能移动之物

phrases.tran_cn: 【非正式用语】 给…安排同伴：约异性朋友出去玩时给…找一个同伴
（以目测、无线电或天文观测方式来）确定…的方位
[美国英语]进退两难，处境艰难，陷于困境
[美国英语]心情不好；身体不好；已损坏的，需要修理的

trans.tran_cn: 解决方案，困境，一剂，定位，一定数量，理解，受操纵的事
trans.tran_en: to have a problem that is difficult to solve

trans.tran_cn: 固定，确定，安排，修理，找到，准备(食物)，梳洗，作弊，惩罚，操纵，定(影)
trans.tran_en: to repair something that is broken or not working properly
to decide on a particular time etc when something will happen

trans.tran_cn: 修理，校准；固定，安装；安排；确定；整理；准备，做
trans.tran_en: to repair something that is broken or not working properly
